title: Cardbook sync to calendar: writes anniversaries one day too late
content:
Task: e.g. on startup, Cardbook checks upcoming anniversaries (e.g. birthdays) from Cardbook Calendars, and writes them to the selected calendar.

Expected: write anniversary to the correct day

Observed: all upcomimng anniversaries are written in the selected format (%n$S syntax, works nicely) to the correct calendar, but always ONE DAY TOO LATE. E.g., if birthday of Cardbook contact is displayed as "26-Feb-2024" in Cardbook, it writes "27-Feb-2024" to calendar (selected "whole day event", so it cannot(?) be b/o time zone problems?)

System: Windows 10. TB 115.5.2 (32-bit). Cardbook 92.1, Last Updated 11. Dezember 2023.
creator: markus.k0

title: Esclusione account da ricezione messaggi dopo aggiornamento
content: Buongiorno da dopo l'aggiornamento alla versione 115.5.2 (64 bit) un acconti di Gmail mantenuto per conservare i contenuti ma chiuso da anni e finora sempre stato escluso dalla ricezione messaggi ha ripreso e continua a volerli scricare. Questo comporta incessantemente un messaggio di errore con apertura di una finestra dove mi chiede i dati di accesso, la chiudo e dopo pochi secondi riappare rendendo impossibile lavorare. Se la lascio aperta posso continuare a lavorare ma non effettua l'invio dei messaggi di altri account. Fino a ieri funzionava tutto bene, come posso fare per escluderlo nuovamente da invio/ricezione? Naturalmente le spunte sono disattivate. Grazie e buon lavoro.
creator: ri.ser.leo

title: Sending Emails in Thunderbird
content:
I have used Thunderbird email for many years. Starting today, I am not able to send an email. I get the following error message:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: p-impout007.msg.pkvw.co.charter.net cmsmtp Connection Rejected - see http://www.spamhaus.org/query/ip/24.106.196.86 AUP#Out-1220.

When I go to that web address, the web page says "Invalid Input".

What do I need to do to fix this problem? My email address is gbeale@ec.rr.com
creator: gbeale

title: Unified Inbox continues to display emails which have been moved to their respective folders in the individual accounts
content: I have clean install of TB 115.5.2 64bit, on a Windows 10 desktop. I have a number of accounts and find the Unified Account is great to do a quick scan and act on the emails most pressing to respond to. In the Unified Account Inbox, the emails I delete or mark as junk are automatically moved from Inbox to the Trash or Junk folders. They no longer exist in the Unified Inbox. When I move emails to their respective folders in the individual accounts by the click, drag and drop method, the emails are moved to those folders but they continue to be shown in the Unified Inbox. No big deal, except the risk is that I miss moving an email from time to time, and these superfluous emails take up space on my PC unnecessarily. Can you advise how I can move emails from the Unified Inbox to the individual folders and not leave a copy in the Unified Inbox? Is it safe to delete the emails in the Unified Inbox that have been moved, and not loose the moved emails in there individual folders?
creator: maat2747

title: Thunderbird Message Filters
content: I have set up a number of Message Filters to automatically run when new email is recieved. None of the run automatically on new email. This is frustrating on it own however I canâ€™t even run them manually on individual filters for the inbox. I have recently moved to Thunderbird for my primary mail client from Mac Mail and definitely like it better, but filters not working and working perfectly in Mac Mail makes it difficult to switch over completely.
creator: richard.beach

title: Cannot Find/Delete Duplicate Events in Calendar
content:
In setting up a new phone, using BirdieSync to synchronize Thunderbird Calendar with the phone, Calendar ended up with duplicate events, but only those that had originally be setup using the "Repeat" button in the "New Event" window. (Ex. a class that meets the same time, same day, each week.)

I cannot find any way to locate and batch delete the duplicates. This seems like it should be basic functionality for a digital calendar. Is it really missing from Thunderbird or am I missing some obscurely located "Delete Duplicates" menu item?
creator: wmcole

Please help. Thanks

title: No access to mails in Thunderbird after update
content:
After updating thunderbird a little week ago maybe - the program began to shut down suddenly - several times. But today there is no acces to mails, folders.. just an almost blank screen. Only the 'headers' are visibly - you 'Files', 'Edit' etc. is visbly. I'm an old Danish women with very little knowledge of reading and understanding complicated possible solutions - but I know how to install a program, so how can I find an older version to install, so that I can read and write an email again?

Now I have to use and old gmail-account and not my usual accounts.

I'm so sad...
creator: ingeorum

title: Thunderbird has an extremely slow startup when it can access Mac contacts
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.5.2 (64-bit) on Mac OS 14.1.2 (23B92).

Since its installation, its startup has been always slow: several seconds with a blank window and the spinning wheel. The startup is slow when Thunderbird has access to the Mac Contacts.

If you go to System Settings, Privacy & Security, Contacts and prevent Thunderbird to access the Contacts, then its startup time is decent. It seems overall snappier.

Clearly, without having access to Contacts, the use of Thunderbird is slightly annoying.

Why is it so slow when accessing Contacts? Is there anything I can do on my side to let it access the Contacts and stay fast?
creator: lordthistle

title: Thunderbird Android question
content: Will Thunderbird on Android move away from reliance on OpenKeyChain that the current K-9 relays on to import PGP keys? OpenKeyChain will not accept the keys I created on Thunderbird desktop.

title: No mails in folder after migration to new computer
content:
Hello, I've migrated Thunderbird(version 115.5.2) to a new computer. The user has more accounts. I copied the Thunderbird folder (in the Roaming folder) (appdata->Roaming..) from the old to a new computer. In the old computer, the user created a folder in Thunderbird and dragged & dropped emails that were important to him.

In the new computer and install, there are NO emails that the user dragged & dropped into "his" folder(in old comp); just the folder is now doubled, but no emails. Everything else is there and working correctly.

Is there any solution to add emails? The old computer is still working; data is avb.
creator: novakmartin

title: email
content:
Good Morning, 

 I am having a problem accessing my email through Thunderbird.  I have a Comcast account.  Thunderbird won't access my new Comcast password therefore I cannot get my email thru thunderbird.  I have been on the phone with comcast and they suggested I contact you.  I am really hoping that you can help me with this because I've been using Thunderbird for a long time and I absolutely LOVE your email instead of using comcast website. When I try to put the new password in this is the message i get: "Sending of password for user lmccleery1 did not succeed.  Mail server mail.comcast.net responded [AUTH] Authentication fail."  I also get the message: "login to server mail.comcast.net with username lmccleery1 failed."

The auth code is 1014. 

 I will be anxiously awaiting your response and hopefully be able to resolve this issue.

Thank you so much, Linda McCleery
creator: lmccleery1

title: Will not send emails to my ISP after update 115.5.2
content:
After updating to TB 115.5.2, we keep getting the following error message when we try to send or forward an email: Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The server is not responded. No such domain at this location. Please check message recipient "xxxxx@gmail.com" and try again. I get this error on all emails we try to send. We get this same error on my spouse's computer also that we use Thunderbird with. I have already checked settings with my ISP and the POP settings are correct. We can use other mail servers such as outlook.com and gmail.com using Thunderbird. ISP is cis broadband. have checked firewall, have uninstalled Thunderbird and re-installed without solution to problem. ISP has checked port to make sure it is not blocked.

incoming emails do not seem to be effected.

gmcfie@cis-broadband.com
creator: gmcfie

title: My thunderbird is slow
content:
So, basically, I am using the latest version of Thunderbird and a Gmail account

I am having issues when it comes to the client staying connected to the server- big issues. Sometimes, it can take me up to an hour to download just two messages from the server. My internet is fine, and while browsing I don't have any issues- it's just with the email client

I thought about using the safe mode without the ad ons to see if that would help, but then I remembered that I didn't install any, so no, it probably wouldn't

Any ideas?. I'm not expecting lightning speeds, but 5/10 minutes would be a huge improvement on almost an hour wait.

Thanks
creator: edaily940

title: dark/light switch in thunderbird email
content:
linux 21.2, runbox.com, thunderbird 115.5, on a website, https://urbansurvival.com/quadwitcher-for-insane-market/, i visit, i am allowed to use this switch, sorry i also use vivaldi as my browser, and i copied what i am trying to show you, but it refuses to paste. At least you have the website, which will have the switch in the bottom right hand corner. Anyway, it is a little switch in the bottom right hand corner of the website that allows you to switch the colors from light themed to dark themed. The dark theme has a shade of white writing on it. Thunderbird has dark fox as an add on, will that do the same thing? will it come in the form of a switch? so i can go back and forth from light to dark to light, depending on my mood???? Thank you...b3

for the record, i also have no idea where the clipboard is in vivaldi/thunderbird. I can see it is on the clipboard, but no idea where the clipboard is. For even more record, i would like to have 6-10 items on the clipboard and be able to take them off the clipboard and put into my emails depending on the recipient.
